attributes.action: Stop all expences claimed by all goverment employees, its there job they should pay.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To stop all goverment empolyees and councilers, from getting to claim expences at our cost (tax payer), it`s there job and they get over £100k per year hey should pay for it or do without.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
